z21Drive.broadcasts

Class Z21BroadcastLanXLocoInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • z21Drive.broadcasts.Z21Broadcast
      • z21Drive.broadcasts.Z21BroadcastLanXLocoInfo

  • public class Z21BroadcastLanXLocoInfo
extends Z21Broadcast
    Probably the most important broadcast, because it represents the current state of a loco.
